import os
import spacy
nlp = spacy.load('en')
import time
import re
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
files = os.listdir('../input/english-literature') 
for f in files:
    file = open('../input/english-literature/' + f, "r")
    print("file = "+f)
    data = file.read()
    data = data.lower()  
    dta_wo_punct= re.sub(r'[^\w\s]', '', data)
    print(dta_wo_punct)
    start = time.time()
    doc = nlp(dta_wo_punct) 
    end = time.time()
    for token in doc:
        print(token)
    time_notpreprocessing = end-start
    not_preprocessing = len(doc)
    print("length before processing:")
    print(not_preprocessing)
    print('time taken without processing:')
    print(time_notpreprocessing)
    start = time.time()
    for token in doc:
        tokens_preprocessing = [token.lemma_ for token in doc if not token.is_stop]                   
    end = time.time()
    time_preprocessing = end-start
    print(tokens_preprocessing)
    for word in tokens_preprocessing:
        print(word)
    preprocessing = len(tokens_preprocessing)
    print("length after processing:")
    print(preprocessing)
    print("time taken after processing:")
    print(time_preprocessing)
    dataset = [not_preprocessing, preprocessing]
    labels = ['Not Preprocessing','Preprocessing']

    plt.bar(labels,dataset)
    plt.ylabel("Number of tokens")
    plt.title("Processing of " + f)
    plt.show()

    dataset = [time_notpreprocessing, time_preprocessing]
    labels = ['Not Preprocessing', 'Preprocessing']

    plt.bar(labels,dataset)
    plt.ylabel("Time Value (MS)")
    plt.title("Overall time of  " + f)
    plt.show()

- Assignment 1:-  Pre Processing

The input documents are written in the English literature and well versed from the specific to the area/domain. The documents are used as input for the IR algorithm and preprocessing is applied to the document. Please write a code to pre-process the document for the IR algorithm. 

The results should compare in both cases tokenization (with pre-processing) and tokenization without vectors (without pre-processing) on given input documents. the comparative analysis must include the following parameters:
1. Total no of tokens  generated  in each input documents  in both scenario, as tokenization with pre-processing and without pre-processing
2. Overall-Time Value in both scenario, as tokenization with/out pre-processing
